mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info(user_id, id, password, user_name, birthdate, sex, email, phone, user_status, tstamp, mail_check, address) VALUES(user_info_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{password}, #{userName}, TO_DATE(#{birthdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{sex}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{userStatus}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{mailCheck}, #{address})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET id = #{id}, password = #{password}, user_name = #{userName}, birthdate = TO_DATE(#{birthdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), sex = #{sex}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, user_status = #{userStatus}, mail_check = #{mailCheck}, address = #{address} WHERE user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT id, password, user_name, TO_CHAR(birthdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS birthdate, sex, email, phone, user_status, TO_CHAR(tstamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS tstamp, mail_check, address FROM user_info WHERE user_id=#{userId}
SELECT id FROM user_info WHERE user_name=#{name} AND phone=#{phone}
SELECT password FROM user_info WHERE user_name=#{name} AND id=#{id} AND email=#{email}

SELECT user_id, id, password, user_name, TO_CHAR(birthdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), sex, email, phone, user_status, TO_CHAR(tstamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), mail_check, address FROM user_info WHERE id=#{id} AND password=#{password}
